name: breach
description: Security vulnerability hunting toolkit. Eight-skill pipeline with autonomous looping discovery for expert bug hunters: source code reconnaissance with threat modeling and git history analysis, automated static scanning (Semgrep + CodeQL), autonomous looping code analysis that varies focus each iteration for non-deterministic coverage, canonical finding structure and PoC standards, finding validation with anti-hallucination gates and triager analysis, vulnerability chain discovery, human-verified reporting, and pipeline orchestration.
